author: whitecapsO
description: Generic Farmware function to move between two grids each move completed in 30Ses

1.label: Number of rows in first grid (0-20):

2.name: colsGrid1
2.label: Number of columns in first grid (0-20):

5.label: Where to start the x axis from in first grid:

8.label: Beginining of X axis in first grid:

9.label: Length of X axis in first grid:

12.name: startLastRowOfGrid1
12.label: Start on the last row of first grid and move backwards:
